===I get an error message "_Side-by-side configuration is incorrect_" or "_MSVCR100.DLL is missing_" when I try to start the application. ===

You need to download and install the [http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=8328 Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)] (for the 32 bit version) or [http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=13523 Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 SP1 Redistributable Package (x64)] (for the 64 bit version) from Microsoft.
Alternatively, you can get the iNFekt setup file which will download and install the required files automatically.

===Where can I get a Windows 2000 compatible version?===
You can use [http://code.google.com/p/infekt/downloads/list?can=1&q=0.7.9 iNFekt 0.7.9].
